DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate long-term clinical feasibility new voice prosthesis insertion system Provox Vega 20 SmartInserter ) voice rehabilitation total laryngectomy . Outcome measure voice quality , ease insertion , device life , reason replacement .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Clinical Feasibility New Indwelling Provox Vega 20 Voice Prosthesis
DOC.criteria: total laryngectomy use Provox2 voice prosthesis least two prior prosthesis change current puncture problem ( f. ex . infection )
